inclusion.criterion: vaginal delivery complicated by a spontaneously first, second or third degree tear with need of continuously suturing
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to read and understand Swedish
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previously perineal surgery other than primary repair after delivery
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has had similar pain twice in the past year and has several gallstones, biliary sludge and CBD stones.
